title: Herzog Documents Kuwait Oil Fields Burning After War
summary: Werner Herzog films apocalyptic aftermath of burning Kuwaiti oil fields post-Gulf War
content: documentary examines burning oil fields in Kuwait after Gulf War, directed by Werner Herzog in 1992, 54-minute film blends war documentary with sci-fi elements, received high critical acclaim on Rotten Tomatoes, explores environmental devastation and war aftermath, features haunting imagery of oil field infernos
